basic.description: Various established theories on Colloids (e.g., DLVO, XDLVO) will be analyzed and subsequently used as tools towards the understanding and prediction of phenomena relevant to contact angles, surface wetting, emulsion or particle dispersion stability, and surfactant self -assembly. Exclusion: ENCH 460.
basic.subject: CHEE
basic.title: Colloid and Surface Science Fundamentals
